title: Evergreen Events — EvergreenBeautyandWellness
description: Want to know what event is coming next? Check out Evergreen's Events page for the latest events including, sound healing, music, art, meditation and more.
cleaned_text: Upcoming events [](/events/sunday-morning-sound-healing-b6k9z) [Sunday Morning Sound Healing (Copy)](/events/sunday-morning-sound-healing-b6k9z) The perfect way to start your Sunday morning! Allow the healing tones and vibrations to relax you deeply into your body. Sound Healing can help you find a your true inner peace. The vibrations created from the Sound Healing instruments can help move out unwanted vibrations like anxiety, stress and sadness. Allow the healing tones to move you back into your natural space of inner peace.
